product_name: Maui Jim Bamboo Forest Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Maui Jim Bamboo Forest Polarized Sunglasses combine the brilliance of MauiPure lenses, full frame flexibility, and the lightest frame yet created by Maui Jim. PolarizedPlus2 lenses eliminate 99.9% of glare; patented multilayer design and lens treatment maximize color transmission and enhance visible color. MauiPure is an incredibly lightweight lens material for all-day wear; waterproof, oil-resistant coating sheds water and repels grease and smudges. Gloss Black Fade frames feature Neutral Grey lenses for especially bright, direct sunlight; they offer rich color and contrast along with very high light production. Rootbeer Fade frames feature HCL (High Contrast Lens) Bronze lenses for added contrast on overcast or foggy days; subtle bronze tint is ideal for variable sunlight. Grilamid frame is ultra-thin and lightweight for superior, long-wearing comfort and flexibility. Traditional pin hinges; Rabalon nose pads help prevent slippage and are adjustable for a secure, custom fit; rubber temple inserts provide extra grip. The Maui Jim Bamboo Forest Polarized Sunglasses feature a modified rectangle design that complements round, oval and heart/triangular shaped faces.
short_description: The Maui Jim Bamboo Forest Polarized Sunglasses combine the brilliance of MauiPure lenses, full frame flexibility, and the lightest frame yet created by Maui Jim.
